item.title: Question in Java, for statement(loop)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I have a question for the for statement(loop)

I am making a game, but i do not know where to place the ints
Would it be like this:

Public class Mopar { public static void main(String[] args) { for(int i=1; i<11; i++) { int Test; } } }

or like this

Public class Mopar { public static void main(String[] args) { int Test; for(int i=1; i<11; i++) { } } }

I want it to change when i type something.

Read full topic
